t: Glorious Things of You Are Spoken
A Psalm of the Sons of Korah. A Song.
On*pn the holy mount stands the city he founded;
the*ld Lord*s loves the gates of Zion more*ld than all the dwelling places of Jacob.
Glorious*ln things of you are spoken, O*ld city of God. Selah*ig
Among*pn those who know me I mention Rahab and Babylon; behold,*ld Philistia and Tyre, with Cush— “This*ld one was born there,” they say.
And*ln of Zion it shall be said, “This*ld one and that one were born in her”; for*ld the Most High himself will establish her.
The*ln Lord*s records as he registers the peoples, “This*ld one was born there.” Selah*ig
Singers*pn and dancers alike say, “All*ld my springs are in you.”
